thread.title: Big East stay - Review
thread.title_full: Big East stay - Review of Hilton Garden Inn New York - Times Square Central, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: carolkH4744RF
title: Big East stay - Review
text: Great location. The rooms were new, clean and quiet. We stayed on the 23nd floor and didn't hear any traffic. The location to the subway was very convenient. We walked to many attractions such as Madison Square Garden, Rockefeller Center, St. Patrick's Cathedral!
